name: Tiredland
description:
TIREDLAND

Rita is exhausted and decides to put herself first for once. Now she's got a creepy but exciting adventure ahead, when she steps inside Tiredland, a place to let off steam when you just can't take it anymore! 


CREDITS

Game Design by Lazy Bees

Written by Laíza Dantas

Programmed by Paula Hemsi

UI/UX Design by Paula Hemsi and Vinicius Scorza

Edited by Hilary Jo Caldis

Animation by Paula Hemsi

Illustrations by Laíza Dantas

Sound FX by Vinicius Scorza

Soundtrack by Universal Production Music

This game was made during GJL Game Parade 2020!
